content: मद्गुः [मस्ज्-उ न्यंक्वा°; <ab>cf.</ab> <ls>Uṇ. 1. 7</ls>] {@--1@} A kind of aquatic bird, a cormorant or diver. {@--2@} A kind of snake. {@--3@} A kind of wild animal. {@--4@} A kind of galley or vessel of war; कोपि मद्गुरभ्यधावत् <ls>Dk.</ls> {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a degraded mixed tribe, the offspring of a Brāhmaṇa by a woman of the bard class; see <ls>Ms. 10. 48.</ls> {@--6@} An outcast.
